encyclopedia.content: HomeWork基本资料 专 辑：HomeWork 歌 手：黎明 语 言：粤/国语 公 司：SONY新力 日 期：2002.09专辑介绍 在音乐上一直是走在流行前端的黎明，在前几张专辑中以电子音乐带领中港台流行音乐潮流，创造出属于自己的“黎式电音”，并风靡各大PUB及舞厅！这次在2002最新粤语大碟《HOMEWORK》中，黎明与老搭档雷颂德及林夕所组合的“黄金铁三角”，在经过一年时间的酝酿，新歌《BABA》充满复古味道的舞曲，加入恰恰式节拍，复古流行兼

entry.def: Homework is school work that teachers give to pupils to do at home in the evening or at the weekend.

example.ex: Have you done your homework, Gemma?
example.tran: 杰玛，你做完家庭作业了吗？

entry.def: If you do your homework, you find out what you need to know in preparation for something.

example.ex: Before you go near a stockbroker, do your homework.
example.tran: 找股票经纪人之前，先要做好必要的准备工作。

means.word_mean: 1. preparatory school work done outside school (especially at home)

example.en: Me and my piece of homework want to rent a couple of horses.
example.zh: 我和我的女朋友想租两匹马。

The closeness this system cultivates is reinforced by the institution of "advisory" classes Teachers meet with students in groups of 25, five mornings a week, for open-ended discussions of everything from homework problems to bad Saturday-night dates.
They are e-mailing classmates to discuss and collaborate (合作) on homework.

sentences.en: It takes him half an hour to finish his homework every day.
sentences.cn: 他每天要用半小时完成作业。

jushi.english: She completed her homework early in the morning.
jushi.chinese: 她一早就把家庭作业完成了。

jushi.english: By doing a little extra homework, the girl got ahead of the rest of the class.
jushi.chinese: 这个女孩做了一些额外的作业就超过了班里其他同学。
